system.effect: Gain Felling(4) Quality, increase Penetration to 9. Rounds detonate Prematurely on attack roll of 91-100, causing firer to suffer damage instead to their arm (with Pen 5 instead of 9), weapon then Jams. Cannot avoid damage by dropping weapon.

description.value: Damage/Effect: Gain Felling(4) Quality, increase Penetration to 9. Rounds detonate Prematurely on attack roll of 91-100, causing firer to suffer damage instead to their arm (with Pen 5 instead of 9), weapon then Jams. Cannot avoid damage by dropping weapon.
